text: Craig Alexander Newmark (born December 6, 1952 in Morristown, New Jersey) is the founder of Craigslist. He currently lives in San Francisco. Newmark is Jewish, which he mentioned in a interview. Newmark achieved a Bachelor of Science degree in 1975 and a Master of Science degree in 1977 while attending Case Western Reserve University. == References == Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American Jews Category:American bloggers Category:People from Morristown, New Jersey
title: Craig Newmark
